mapper.update: update db_product_titlelog set QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FILED4 = #{filed4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FILED5 = #{filed5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SID = #{sid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FILED1 = #{filed1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FILED2 = #{filed2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FILED3 = #{filed3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, QTY, OPER, OPERTIME, FILED4, FILED5, SID, TITLE, FILED1, FILED2, FILED3, DESCR from db_product_titlelog where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, QTY, OPER, OPERTIME, FILED4, FILED5, SID, TITLE, FILED1, FILED2, FILED3, DESCR from db_product_titlelog
